testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Send_Now_Option_(Error)
Create_Campaign_With_Send_Now_Option
Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Error)
Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Error_Date_)
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_SMS_Bulk_6 @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_SMS_Bulk scenario: Create campaign with schedule option (error date ) given I am on the campaign settings page "Bulk SMS" in "SMS" ... passed in 22.97s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 4.004s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.289s when I enter a percentage "100" in the phase ... passed in 1.137s when I enter the today date in the phase ... passed in 1.672s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.319s then I see the error message "All the phases should have a configured date" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 2.085s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Error_Whit_Percentage)
Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Warning_Percentage_100%)
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_SMS_Bulk_5 @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_SMS_Bulk scenario: Create campaign with schedule option (warning percentage 100%) given I am on the campaign settings page "Bulk SMS" in "SMS" ... passed in 22.27s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 4.06s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.305s when I enter a percentage "100" in the phase ... passed in 1.15s when I click the add phase ... passed in 1.326s then I see the error message "Please, check the percentages assigned to each phase; the total amount must be 100%" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 2.098s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_SMS_Bulk_7 @Test_Create_Campaign_Options_Send_Schedule_SMS_Bulk scenario: Create campaign with schedule option given I am on the campaign settings page "Bulk SMS" in "SMS" ... passed in 22.78s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 3.992s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.313s when I enter a percentage "50" in the phase ... passed in 1.173s when I enter the "today" date in the phase ... passed in 1.688s when I enter the "now" hour ... passed in 1.492s when I click the add phase ... passed in 1.313s when I enter a percentage "50" in the phase ... passed in 1.17s when I enter the "tomorrow" date in the phase ... passed in 1.572s when I enter the "tomorrow" hour ... passed in 1.498s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.384s then I am redirected to the destination creation page ... passed in 2.051s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
